name: Ext_R2_ElementDefinition_pattern
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ElementDefinition.pattern[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ElementDefinition.pattern[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ElementDefinition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Value must have at least these property values
element.definition: Specifies a value that the value in the instance SHALL follow - that is, any value in the pattern must be found in the instance. Other additional values may be found too. This is effectively constraint by example.  The values of elements present in the pattern must match exactly (case-sensitive, accent-sensitive, etc.).
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.pattern[x]` maps to R4B `ElementDefinition.pattern[x]`. Type `Meta` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The version specific identifier, as it appears in the version portion of the URL. This values changes when the resource is created, updated, or deleted.
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.pattern[x]` maps to R4B `ElementDefinition.pattern[x]`. Type `Meta` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
